newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Wells Fargo estimates cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Wells Fargo estimates cut.

text.p: Brown Brothers Harriman and Co Ray Soifer reduced his 1997 estimate for Wells Fargo Co from $13.80 to $12.65 a share and 1998 estimate from $18.25 to $17.00.
-- Soifer cited conerns about continuing erosion of revenue, which is now running at normalized rate of about $1.765 billion and the slowing of the pace of expense reduction.
